<!-- Chatbot Course Notes Project Instructions -->

# Chatbot Course Notes Assistant

This project creates a chatbot that answers questions from course notes using LlamaIndex, Faiss, and Llama 3.1.

## Project Status
- [x] Create project structure
- [x] Set up dependencies
- [x] Build core chatbot
- [x] Create configuration
- [x] Add documentation
- [x] Create demo notebook

## Development Guidelines
- Use RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) approach
- Implement vector database with Faiss for fast similarity search
- Use LlamaIndex for document processing and indexing
- Integrate Llama 3.1 for response generation
- Support multiple document formats for course notes
- Provide clear examples and demonstrations
